title: Looking to party with Normals teams!
body:
As the Title suggests, For the next 2 Days i'm hoping to party up with full 5-Man Teams for a few Normals games.
I do however have some requirements to be met if you want to join, If you feel the urge to play {{champion:203}} please sate it; She's mine, and Secondly i'd like to suggest no players over the rank of Gold. I'm not the best player in the game and atm i am unranked so just to play it safe i'll only accept Bronze, Silver or Gold players otherwise the Normals queue will match me with more skilled players.

If you would like to join please fill in the format below, I look forward to seeing you In-Game :D:

In-Game Username: 
Role:
Lane:
Champion:
Season ranking:

If you haven't achieved a S5/S6 rank yet that's fine, **I'll accept anyone below the Gold devision.**

replies.body:
In-Game Username: J4n13L
Role: junggle
lane: any
champion:Warwick or Tryndamere
Season Ranking: None
